references.paper_title: Diffusion models beat gans on image synthesis
references.reason: This paper introduced the use of diffusion models for image generation, a core technique upon which many of the models in this paper are based.
This paper introduced denoising diffusion probabilistic models (DDPMs), which are fundamental to many of the models used in the paper.
This paper introduced variational diffusion models (VDMs), which are a significant advancement over DDPMs and are used in this paper.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduced latent diffusion models (LDMs), which are used in the paper and are a key development in high-resolution image generation.

references.paper_title: Elucidating the design space of diffusion-based generative models
references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive overview of diffusion models, which is important context for understanding the approach in the paper.
